    • Method Detail

      • startGame

        public void startGame()
        Start a game
        Pre conditions:
        Game must have 4 players and game must not been started yet.
        Post conditions:
        Game must have started

      • leaveGame

        public void leaveGame()
        Allow user to leave a game
        Pre conditions:
        User must be in a game
        Post conditions:
        Game has to be stopped and user must be out of game

      • SaveGame

        public void SaveGame()
        Save current game
        Pre conditions:
        User must be in a game
        Post conditions:
        Game has to be saved in server

      • LoadGame

        public void LoadGame()
        Load previous game
        Pre conditions:
        Server must have information about saved game, All users who played before should be joined
        Post conditions:
        Game must be loaded and started
